summary: Cabal, haskell's build system syntax coloration
name: Cabal.vim
description:
Syntax for the cabal build system.
Also contain a ftdetect file to associate all *.cabal files with the syntax
Should recognize all commands of the current version.

Checkout http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=2611 for some cabal snippets
install_details:
load the file in vim then :
:so %

versions.release_notes: Updated to the last version of cabal. Added more highlighting for cabal function, true/false and version number. Also added missing comment highlighting. Cabal's known compiler are highlighted too.
